text.p: Suppose [mathjaxinline]T: V\rightarrow W[/mathjaxinline] is a linear transformation. Is the question of whether [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is into an existence question or a uniqueness question?

font.p: The question of whether [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is into is equivalent to asking if [mathjaxinline]\mathrm{Ker}(T) = \{ \mathbf{0}\}[/mathjaxinline]. This is equivalent to asking if [mathjaxinline]\mathbf{0}[/mathjaxinline] is the unique element in [mathjaxinline]\mathrm{Ker}(T)[/mathjaxinline].
